title: Enendru Solvadho Lyrics Om Shanthi Om Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Enendru Solvadho Lyrics Om Shanthi Om
Singer(s): Harish Raghavendra, Swetha Mohan
Lyrics: Na Muthukumar

Ennendru Solvadho
yaedhendru sollvadho
unn kannai kandaal
enakullae poraattam.

Envazhavil ippadi
thadumaattram eppadi
en varththai thaeindhu
oru mounam thee moottum.

Vizhi paarvai odi vandhu
bodhai aettruthadi
paadhai maattruthadi ennai

Vidi kaalai vandhavudan
imaigal thirandhavudan
kenji kettkudhadi unnai, unnai.

Idhuthaanaa idhuthaana
kadhal idhuthanaa
inbam thunbam serndhaal
kadhal adhuthaanaa.
Ennendru Solvadho ...

Idhupola eppozhudhum aandhillai
kaalgal thallaadi ponadhillai
parandhaen midhandhaen,vinnmelae

Edhirpaarthu eppodhum nindradhillai
idhayam enpechai kettkavillai
thaviththaen thudiththaen, unnaale.

Udai maara, nadai maara
naan pudhidhaai pirandhaney.

Sila neram unai ennai
naan ennai marandhaeney.
indha maayam ellaam
pennae edhanaale.

Idhuthaanaa idhuthaana
kadhal idhuthanaa
inbam thunbam serndhaal
kadhal adhuthaanaa.
Ennendru Solvadho ...

Thaniyaaga naanpesi nindradhillai
thaedi thindaadi thozhaindhadhillai
edhanaal edhanaal idhu yeno.

pala nimidam yosiththum puriyavillai
thookkam tholaidhooram ponadhillai
edhanaal edhanaal idhu yeno.

Nadhimelae ilai polae naan
unnaal alaindhaeney.
nagarndhaalum nagaraamal
naan unnaal uraindhaeney.

ada kadhal vandhaal
dhinamum thirunaazhey.

Ennendru Solvadho
yaedhendru sollvadho
unn kannai kandaal
enakullae poraattam.

Envazhavil ippadi
thadumaattram eppadi
en varththai thaeindhu
oru mounam thee moottum.

Vizhi paarvai odi vandhu
bodhai aettruthadi
paadhai maattruthadi ennai

Vidi kaalai vandhavudan
imaigal thirandhavudan
kenji kettkudhadi unnai, unnai.

Idhuthaanaa idhuthaana
kadhal idhuthanaa
inbam thunbam serndhaal
kadhal adhuthaanaa.
Ennendru Solvadho ...
